title: koafish Twitch Bot
subtitle: A twitch bot specifically for osu streaming.

sections.title: Overview
content: osu viewers love to request map to streamers, so I made a bot to automatically download them, and send the map information directly through osu chat system.

features.name: Download osu maps automatically from twitch chat
features.description: This feature should be able to be modified but I just made it auto.

features.name: Now playing song
features.description: !np is a very common command for osu players. Whenever they hear any song they like from the streamer, they can just type this in the chat.

features.name: Send map info via osu irc
features.description: The streamer can just check the map request in game.

features.name: Extra UI interface
features.description: Map queues will be shown in a window with green screen. Streamer can show the current queue to the stream.
